name: Dippy Dappy
overview: Published in the book "Winning Games on the Commodore 64" and the German version, "Das große Commodore-64-Spiele-Buch". "You chuck the apples on over, Dappy, and I'll catch them", you say. But Dappy isn't too bright and can't tell the difference between the apples you want and those eggs the fowl left in the orchard. If you don't want a face full of yolk, you'd better catch them all!
